name: Don't Screw With Christmas!
description:
Don't Screw With Christmas!

Santa messed up, he crashed into your house and now there are gifts all over the place! 

Will you help him find the 5 missing gifts?

Controls: Move AroundWASD  + MouseJoysticksJump SpaceA [Xbox] or X [Playstation]Activate the Red ScrewsE KeyY [Xbox] or ▲ [Playstation]

Game Made for the XmasJam22 put together by GameDev Técnico.

Made By:

- Diogo Mendonça - Programming

- Bárbara Marcial - 3D Modeling

- Eduardo Barrancos - Music | UI

- Evandro Sequeira - 3D Modeling | Level Design

[Game Design was done by all Team Members]

Context

This game is a gift to:

- [Fill with Secret Santas]

In this jam each team wrote a Christmas letter and then received, secretly, a letter in return to use as the theme of their game.

 This game's inspiration was the following letter, written by the people mentioned above.
